page.title: 09LARKHALL EMPLOYMENT
page.content: THE MAIN FORMS OF EMPLOYMENT IN LARKHALL ARE THE CLOTHING AND TEXTILE INDUSTRY,ENGINEERING AND CONSTRUCTION. THE MAIN SOURCES OF EMPLOYMENT IN THE CLOTHING AND TEXTILE INDUSTRY IS THE DAKS SIMPSON FACTORY IN BIRKENSHAW IN LARKHALL.THERE ARE VARIOUS SMALL BUSINESSES WHICH EMPLOY PEOPLE IN THE ENGINEERING AND CONSTRUCTION INDUSTRIES. THE PERCENTAGE OF UNEMPLOYED IN LANAKSHIRE IS NOT VERY HIGH COMPARED TO OTHER TOWNS AND CITIES.THE ONLY FIGURES AVAILABLE WERE FROM THE FOLLOWING AREAS OF LANAKSHIRE: LARKHALL NETHERBURN STONEHOUSE BLACKWOOD ASHGILL LESMAHGOW COALBURN TOTALS: MALE 1501 FEMALE 652
